page.title: 01An overall view of Bradninch
page.content: Our D Block is 4km.x 3km. It starts near Waterleat House and finishes near Hele Cross. Unfortunately, it does not include{Bradninch School.}The majority of the town of Bradninch appears in the eastern area. Most of our block consists of farm and grazing ground, much of which belongs to the{Duchy of {Cornwall.}The road running through Bradninch used to be a main thoroughfare to the South West but our town is now bypassed by the A381 and the{M5 motorway.}These can be clearly seen as can the{River Culm. Our grid is full of rolling hills, wildlife and we are proud to live in such pleasant surroundings. As many of us as possible took part in the survey and we received marvellous support and encouragement from our community.
